title: Avocado and cheese quesadillas
description: Try a taste of Mexico with this luscious snack; the ultimate comfort food.

method.Step 1: Spread the tortillas with refried beans, slices of avocado, and sprinkle over rocket leaves and grated Cheddar. Top each with another soft flour tortilla.

method.Step 2: Heat the olive oil in a frying pan and fry 1 at a time until crisp on both sides, then cut into quarters and serve.
